title: You may often find the need to get the auto incremented ID value for a row that you have just inserted into your database table. You can achieve this with the lastInsertId() method.

inline_content.Text: You may often find the need to get the auto incremented ID value for a row that you have just inserted into your database table. You can achieve this with the lastInsertId() method.
